tool_description: Performs ABC analysis to classify products based on their contribution to total sales value, helping prioritize inventory management efforts.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs to classify

annual_sales_volume.description: Annual sales volume for each product (units sold)

class_a_threshold.description: Percentage threshold for Class A products (0.6-0.9)

class_b_threshold.description: Cumulative percentage threshold for Class B products (0.8-0.98)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: product_ids, annual_sales_volume, and unit_costs must have the same length.
Invalid sales volume: Annual sales volume must be non-negative integers.
Invalid unit cost: Unit costs must be positive numbers.
Invalid threshold values: class_a_threshold must be less than class_b_threshold, both between 0 and 1.
Threshold order error: class_a_threshold must be between 0.6-0.9, class_b_threshold between 0.8-0.98.
usage: Provide product IDs with corresponding annual sales volumes and unit costs. The tool calculates each product's contribution to total sales value and assigns ABC classifications.

product_classifications.description: ABC classification (A, B, or C) for each product

sales_value_contribution.description: Each product's percentage contribution to total sales value

cumulative_contribution.description: Cumulative percentage contribution when products are ranked by value

management_priority.description: Recommended management priority level for each product
